definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Phelps' eight gold medals and seven world records left you in awe.
sentences.chinese: 菲爾普斯的八塊金牌和七項世界紀錄讓人肅然起敬。

sentences.english: The only jerk I knew from my day was Shawn Ray.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的金牌，我知道我的一天蕭恩射線。

sentences.english: He shall have his medal and diploma in the above-mentioned event withdrawn," the IOC said.
sentences.chinese: 他在前述賽事中的金牌與榮譽證書應被收回。

sentences.english: But rarely has a country won more than 50 gold medals.
sentences.chinese: 但是歷史上金牌數超過50枚的國家非常少。

sentences.english: He lost his gold medal because of his illness.
The 29th Olympics were successfully hosted in Beijing and Chinese athletes won the most gold medals.
sentences.chinese: 第29屆奧運會在北京成功舉辦，中國金牌數第一。

sentences.english: China's world champion Xiao Qin won the pommel horse gold medal.
sentences.chinese: 中國的世界冠軍肖欽奪得鞍馬金牌。

sentences.english: Eight years later the Slovenian rower also brought home a gold medal.
sentences.chinese: 八年後，這名斯洛文尼亞選手又爲祖國贏得一枚金牌。

sentences.english: A:I think he deserved his gold.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲他的金牌當之無愧。

sentences.english: The other one percent opted for Russia to take home most gold.
sentences.chinese: 另外1%的人認爲俄羅斯將會獲得最多金牌數。

sentences.english: Should we really consider them well-earned?
sentences.chinese: 可我們真該覺得這些金牌都是贏得應得嗎？

sentences.english: Some athletes did not express all their appreciation after winning a gold medal.
sentences.chinese: 有些運動員在贏得金牌後沒有表達出對國家的感激。

sentences.english: I wonder if China or America will win most medals.
sentences.chinese: 我在猜想是中國還是美國會奪得最多的金牌。

sentences.english: And Liuxiang won a gold medal in the Athens 2004 Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 還有劉翔雅典奧運會勇奪金牌那一刻。

sentences.english: The United States plays Brazil in the gold-medal match Saturday night.
sentences.chinese: 週六晚，美國女排將在金牌爭奪賽中對戰巴西。

sentences.english: We have a great admiration for the gold medalists.
sentences.chinese: 我們對金牌獲得者極爲敬佩。

definition: bronze medal/bronze plaque bearing a business name or logo etc/CL:枚[mei2]
to snatch gold/to take first place in a competition
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
to take (after a struggle)/to wrest/to seize/to capture/to win (a trophy)
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
medal table/tally of trophies/list of prizewinners
Xu Haifeng (1957-), PRC sharpshooter, 50m pistol gold medalist at Los Angeles 1984 Olympics
